title: Seyyar
overview: Yasin Gencer is a modest peddler who sells chickpeas and rice between Taksim and Tepebaşı. He lives with his lover Çiğdem, on the verge of opening the restaurant, they have been planning for a long time, and is at the very end of marketing his rice, which everyone loves to taste, with a special recipe heirloom from his family to wider masses and reaching their dreams. But in a way that befits Beyoğlu, one night after another, everything turns upside down. Unexpectedly, Yasin will find himself side by side with the darkest figures of Istanbul.
